content.query:
--Calls by Region Broken out
SELECT
SwitchNum,
count(*) CallRecords
FROM dbo.selectColumns_v
GROUP BY SwitchNum
ORDER BY SwitchNum

--TotalRecords in the Blob Container
SELECT COUNT(*) TotalRecords FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://fraudcallstorageblob.blob.core.windows.net/fraudoutput/*.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS [result];
